Question
========

Of all single people in the Netherlands, 80% have a disposable income of less than 30,000 euros per year. Of the non-single people that is 60%. The Netherlands has 15% single people. What is the probability that someone who has a disposable income of less than 30,000 euros is single?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.12
* 0.19
* 0.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.19: Correct
* 0.7: Incorrect
